content: अवांच् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अवांचति अव-अच्-क्विप्] {@--1@} Turned downwards, bent down, stooping; कुर्वंतमित्यतिभरेण नगानवाचः <ls>Śi. 6. 79</ls>; वनाल्यवांचीव चकार संहतिः <ls>Ki. 14. 34.</ls> {@--2@} Being or situated below, lower than (with <ab>abl.</ab>) यदवाक् पृथिव्याः <ls>Śat. Br.</ls> {@--3@} Headlong, looking downwards. {@--4@} South. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} , {%<ab>n.</ab>%} Brahma. --ची {@--1@} The south. {@--2@} The lower region.
